name: 1 - Reinf Turn 2
_source: speak;Aurora; Huh{tgm}...{tgm}? What's happening?{w} I fall asleep in a barrel for a couple hours and this is what happens{tgm}...
speak;Emma; Wait, who are you? And how did you get on board?

speak;Aurora; My name is Aurora, and this is my bird, Sora.{w} I was in the village when the demons attacked, and I hid in this ship.{w} When I heard you all taking off, I stowed away{tgm}...{tgm}{w} I hope it's not too much trouble.
speak;Emma; Well, if you're going to come with us, help us fight off these Umbra.
speak;Aurora; I suppose that settles it.{w}{c:expression;Aurora;NoSmile} I'll be your fortune teller from this day on,{w} so be honored to have my mystic expertise.
speak;Emma; Um{tgm}...{tgm} Thanks.{w} I hope you can do more than that on the battlefield.

speak;Aurora; Well{tgm}...{tgm}it seems like you have some latent talent within you.{w} Being a fortune teller allows me to see your untapped potential,{w} and it seems yours could be unlocked with just a small prod.{w} Try to envision yourself splitting your magic into multiple parts.
speak;Aurora; Cast as if each plume of flame would become three at once.
speak;Emma; I{tgm}...{tgm}I think I understand what you mean all of a sudden.
speak;Aurora; Proved my worth, have I?{w} Come on Sora, I've got a vision coming on{tgm}...{tgm}{w} and it looks like us celebrating in victory!
